event_registry_properties.name: action
event_registry_properties.item: Schedule a repair action to replace the affected Field Replaceable Unit (FRU), the identity of which can be determined using fmdump -v -u EVENT_ID. Please consult the detail section of the knowledge article for additional information.
event_registry_properties.name: description
event_registry_properties.item: When a non-fatal uncorrectable error occurs on a core on a CPU chip, domain software attempts to offline the core. This fault occurs when the number of offline attempts has exceeded an acceptable threshold.
event_registry_properties.name: details
event_registry_properties.item:
The number of non-fatal uncorrectable errors on a core on a CPU chip has exceeded
an acceptable threshold and the domain has not offlined the CPU core.

The domain software has not offlined the core despite previous requests as a result of
'fault.chassis.SPARC-Enterprise.cpu.SPARC64-VI.core.se' faults.

The domain software will attempt to offline the core, but could panic as a result of
one of the following uncorrectable error traps:

   Uncorrectable error trap type 40 (TT=40)
   Uncorrectable error in a data field
   Domain may enter a RED state which may cause the domain to panic.

The core of the CPU chip will be deconfigured after the platform is
power cycled or after the domain reboots or after a Dynamic
Reconfiguration operation is performed.


The recommended service action for this event is to schedule the replacement of the affected FRU.

       LEGEND

      RED        = SUNW-MSG-ID
      BLUE     = EVENT_ID
      GREEN  = FRU


Step 1. Collect the fault message (use one of the following methods):


   Single-line fault message displayed on the XSCF console:

   Mar 20 21:04:47 san-ff2-21-0 fmd: SOURCE: sde, REV: 1.12, CSN: 7860000772  
   EVENT-ID: dbbde764-f72d-49a0-8280-68c44342527b
   Refer to http://www.sun.com/msg/SCF-8000-H3 for detailed information.


   Complete fault message using 'fmdump -m' on the XSCF console:

   MSG-ID: SCF-8000-H3, TYPE: Fault, VER: 1, SEVERITY: Major
   EVENT-TIME: Tue Mar 20 21:04:46 UTC 2007
   PLATFORM: SPARC-Enterprise, CSN: 7860000772, HOSTNAME: san-ff2-21-0
   SOURCE: sde, REV: 1.12
   EVENT-ID: dbbde764-f72d-49a0-8280-68c44342527b
   DESC: When a non-fatal uncorrectable error occurs on a core on a CPU chip, domain software attempts to
   offline the core. This fault occurs when the number of offline attempts has exceeded an
   acceptable threshold.
   Refer to http://www.sun.com/msg/SCF-8000-H3 for more information.
   AUTO-RESPONSE: Future non-fatal uncorrectable errors for this core on a CPU chip will not be recorded on the XSCF.
   IMPACT: The uncorrectable error trap may cause the domain to panic.
   REC-ACTION: Schedule a repair action to replace the affected Field Replaceable Unit (FRU),
   the identity of which can be determined using fmdump -v -u EVENT_ID.
   Please consult the detail section of the knowledge article for additional information.


Step 2. Collect the output from the 'fmdump -v -u EVENT_ID' command


   SPARC Enterprise platform example:
 
   xscf> fmdump -v -u dbbde764-f72d-49a0-8280-68c44342527b

         TIME                 UUID                                 MSG-ID
         Mar 20 21:04:46.9508 dbbde764-f72d-49a0-8280-68c44342527b SCF-8000-H3
           50%  fault.chassis.SPARC-Enterprise.cpu.SPARC64-VI.core.se-offlinereq

                Problem in: hc:///chassis=0/cmu=0/cpu=0/core=1
                   Affects: hc:///chassis=0/cmu=0/cpu=0/core=1
                       FRU: hc://:product-id=SPARC-Enterprise:chassis-id=7860000772:
                            server-id=san-ff2-21-0:serial=PP06121471:
                            part=CA06761-D102 A0:revision=0101/component=/MBU_B/CPUM#0

          50%  fault.chassis.SPARC-Enterprise.cpu.SPARC64-VI.core.se-offlinereq

               Problem in: hc:///chassis=0/cmu=0/cpu=0/core=0
                  Affects: hc:///chassis=0/cmu=0/cpu=0/core=0
                      FRU: hc://:product-id=SPARC-Enterprise:chassis-id=7860000772:
                           server-id=san-ff2-21-0:serial=PP06121471:
                           part=CA06761-D102 A0:revision=0101/component=/MBU_B/CPUM#0


Step 3. Contact your Authorized Service Provider.



If you require additional information, please refer to InfoDoc #87402.
event_registry_properties.name: impact
event_registry_properties.item: The uncorrectable error trap may cause the domain to panic.
event_registry_properties.name: response
event_registry_properties.item: Future non-fatal uncorrectable errors for this core on a CPU chip will not be recorded on the XSCF.
event_registry_properties.name: title
event_registry_properties.item: The number of non-fatal uncorrectable errors on a core on a CPU chip has exceeded an acceptable threshold and tthe domain has not offlined the CPU core.
